Title: La virgen gitana
Actors: Paquita Rico, Alfredo Mayo, Lina Yegros, Lola Ramos
Plot: Carmen (Paquita Rico) is a gypsy orphan girl. One day a she meets painter Eduardo Miranda (Alfredo Mayo), who asks her to pose for him for a picture of Debla, the gypsy virgin. She falls in love with the painter not knowing he is married. But soon people begin to talk...
